XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Moodle question/type/calculatedformat. This question type also relies on question_dataset* tables created by the calculated question type and the question_numerical_units table created by the numerical question type.

TABLE.NAME: question_calculatedfmt
TABLE.COMMENT: Options for questions of type calculatedformat

TABLE.NAME: question_calculatedfmt_opts
TABLE.COMMENT: Options for questions of type calculatedformat

FIELD.NAME: single
FIELD.COMMENT: If 0 it multiple response (checkboxes). Otherwise it is radio buttons.

FIELD.NAME: shuffleanswers
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the choices can be randomly shuffled.

FIELD.NAME: correctfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Feedback shown for any correct response.

FIELD.NAME: partiallycorrectfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Feedback shown for any partially correct response.

FIELD.NAME: incorrectfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Feedback shown for any incorrect response.

FIELD.NAME: answernumbering
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicates how and whether the choices should be numbered.

FIELD.NAME: shownumcorrect
FIELD.COMMENT: If true, then when the user gets a multiple-response question partially correct, tell them how many choices they got correct alongside the feedback.
